Name: official/cas
Description: The Central Authentication Service (CAS) is a single sign-on protocol for the web.

Configuration.Name: limit/max_number
Configuration.Description: Max number of login retries (0 means disabled)

Configuration.Name: limit/failure_store_time
Configuration.Description: Max time to store failed logins (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: limit/lock_time
Configuration.Description: Time to lock an account if limit/max_number is reached (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: forgot_password_text
Configuration.Description: Text which shall be shown if a user clicks 'Forgot Password'

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/terms_of_service
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Terms of Service and will be be the first link in bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/imprint
Configuration.Description: This URL links the Imprint and will be be the second link in bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/privacy_policy
Configuration.Description: This URL links the Privacy Policy and will be be the last link in bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.
